heading: Cowardly Investors Sell
body: Unfortunately, investors in Gamestop stock realised that their hands were wrought of paper, not of diamonds. HPQ data by YCharts While I do believe that the decline in business has run its course for the time being, I don't think it is wise to view the company as a value story either, as the company hasn't been adding substantial new revenues to its bottom line. Management has cut costs aggressively, but at the expense of margins, while deploying all its cash into share repurchases and dividend payments rather than funding organic growth.
